faqs.question: What are the key ingredients in GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: The key ingredients are Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid, which work together to brighten and hydrate the skin.

faqs.question: Is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum suitable for oily skin?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is specifically formulated for oily and combination skin types.

faqs.question: How often should I use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: For best results, use it once or twice daily, preferably in the morning.

faqs.question: Can I use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum with other skincare products?
faqs.answer: Yes, it can be layered with other serums, moisturizers, or sunscreen, but avoid mixing it with other Vitamin C products.

faqs.question: Will GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum make my skin more sensitive to the sun?
faqs.answer: Vitamin C can increase sun sensitivity, so always apply sunscreen during the day.

faqs.question: How long does it take to see results with GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: Results vary, but many users notice brighter skin within 2-4 weeks of consistent use.

faqs.question: Is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum vegan and cruelty-free?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is both vegan and cruelty-free.

faqs.question: Can I use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum if I have sensitive skin?
faqs.answer: If you have sensitive skin, perform a patch test first and consult a dermatologist if needed.

faqs.question: Does GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum contain any fragrances?
faqs.answer: No, it is fragrance-free to minimize irritation.

faqs.question: How should I store GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: Store it in a cool, dark place away from direct sunlight to preserve its potency.

faqs.question: Can I use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum under makeup?
faqs.answer: Yes, apply it before makeup for a radiant base.

faqs.question: Does GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum help with acne scars?
faqs.answer: Yes, Vitamin C can help fade dark spots and improve skin texture over time.

faqs.question: Is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum non-comedogenic?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is formulated to be non-comedogenic and won’t clog pores.

faqs.question: Can I use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum at night?
faqs.answer: While it’s best used in the morning, you can use it at night if preferred.

faqs.question: Does GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum have an expiration date?
faqs.answer: Yes, check the bottle for the expiration date and use within 6 months of opening.

faqs.question: Can I use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum with retinol?
faqs.answer: Yes, but use them at different times of the day to avoid irritation.

faqs.question: Is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum suitable for all skin tones?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is safe and effective for all skin tones.

faqs.question: Does GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum contain alcohol?
faqs.answer: No, it is alcohol-free to avoid drying out the skin.

faqs.question: Where can I purchase GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: It is available on our official website and select retailers.

faqs.question: Does GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum have a money-back guarantee?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee.
